text: 8AM is the second maxi-single by Japanese rock band Coldrain, it was released on April 8, 2009. The song 8AM was used as the ending theme for the anime Hajime no Ippo: New Challenger. ==Track listing== All lyrics written by Masato Hayakawa, all music written by Masato Hayakawa and Ryo Yokochi. title: 8AM (song)
